description:
Fay and the other Apostles manage to find the save item which allows some of them to escape the labyrinth. Uroboros joins Fay and his party as they continue through the labyrinth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le sombre palais entre mort et renaissance, Lucemia
Rushemea, das Labyrinth von Tod und Wiedergeburt
The "Labyrinth" of Death and Rebirth: Luceimia
死と再生の"冥宮"ルシェイメア
